general.gigTitle: build custom website as full stack website developer, website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Expert Full Stack Developer, React Js, Node Js, Next Js, Express Js
sellerCard.description: As a website designer and developer proficient in React js, Node js, TypeScript, MongoDB, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and Laravel, I blend creativity with technical expertise to craft visually appealing and highly functional web solutions. Using Figma for design, I create intuitive user interfaces that enhance user experience. With React js and Node js, I develop dynamic frontend and backend systems, ensuring seamless interaction and performance. My proficiency in TypeScript ensures robust, scalable code, while MongoDB and PHP Laravel enable efficient data management and backend development.

description.content:
Hey there!


I'm Sahinur, your full-stack web developer!


Do you want:


  • Custom Website development for your business?
  • Existing website needs updated?
  • A reliable full-stack developer to bring your vision to life?


You've come to the right place!


As a full-stack developer proficient in React JS, Node JS, TypeScript, MongoDB, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and Laravel, I blend creativity with technical expertise to create visually appealing and highly functional web solutions.


What can I do?


  • Website development using PHP Laravel, React.js, Node.js, Next.js, and Express.js
  • Implement MongoDB for scalable database solutions
  • Full stack custom PHP web development as front-end web developer
  • Front-end development with the latest technologies


The industry I worked:


  • Payment
  • Marketing
  • Inventory
  • Events
  • Chat
  • Dashboard
  • Landing page
  • Blog
  • Portfolio
  • Booking


Why me?


  • Quick turnaround time, 24/7 support
  • Dedicated full-stack and front-end web development expertise


Ready to get started?


  • Let's discuss your business, requirements, and deadline
  • Provide me with all the necessary files
  • Receive a custom offer for website development


Note: Please Message first before placing your order.

slide.name: build custom website as full stack website developer, website development

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is the data I'm sharing with you safe and secure?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, 100% secure. I take data privacy very seriously and use industry-standard practices to ensure your information is protected.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide training and support after the job is completed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I provide support and personalized training sessions over platforms like Zoom to ensure you're confident in the work. If you have any questions at all, I'm here to help.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What technologies do you use for web development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I specialize in React.js, Node.js, Next.js, Express.js, PHP Laravel, MongoDB, and MySQL. This allows me to build responsive, dynamic, and secure websites.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you rebuild or redesign my existing website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can rebuild or redesign your existing website to make it more modern, responsive, and aligned with your current business needs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you ensure the website will be responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I use modern web development practices and frameworks to ensure that your website looks and functions perfectly on all devices, including desktops, tablets, and mobile phones.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your process for developing a website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: My process includes understanding your requirements, designing a prototype, developing the website, testing, and finally deploying it. I also offer post-deployment support and training.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you handle revisions and feedback?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I offer unlimited revisions for the Premium package and multiple revisions for other packages. I work closely with you to incorporate your feedback and ensure the final product meets your expectations.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer SEO services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I incorporate basic SEO practices in all websites to ensure they are search engine friendly. For more advanced SEO services, please contact me to discuss your needs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need detailed information about your project, including any design preferences, functionality requirements, and content. Please provide all necessary files and information upfront to ensure a smooth development process.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your turnaround time?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Turnaround times vary depending on the complexity of the project. The Basic package is 5 days, the Standard package is 10 days, and the Premium package is 14 days.

packageList.title: Metro Path
packageList.description: Basic website up to 1 pages following your design and referece no API integration

packageList.title: Metro Ways
packageList.description: Business website following clients design 3-5 pages basic API integration

packageList.title: Metro Lines
packageList.description: Scalable website development following your design basic API integration (Customizable)

reviews.comment: The web developer delivered an exceptional website that exceeded all expectations. It’s lightning-fast, effortlessly responsive, and offers an intuitive user experience. The design is both modern and functional, allowing visitors to navigate with ease while enjoying a visually stunning layout.

Sahinur developed the website efficiently, implementing all adjustments promptly based on my feedback. The final result aligns perfectly with my vision, and I would happily work with him again on future website development projects.

The website was developed efficiently, with all adjustments made quickly according to my feedback. The end result is exactly what I envisioned, and I would certainly consider working together again for future website development projects.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable reply.

reviews.comment: Sahinur consistently delivers top-notch work and outstanding service. Choosing him for our website was the best decision—we were blown away by the results, both in design and functionality!

Sahinur did an amazing job turning my ideas into a stunning website. His professionalism and expertise as a website developer were evident throughout the project. I’m excited to collaborate with him again!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your valuable feedback!

reviews_snippet.comment: Sahinur developed the website efficiently, implementing all adjustments promptly based on my feedback. The final result aligns perfectly with my vision, and I would happily work with him again on future website development projects.

Sahinur was an exceptional choice for building our company’s website. He dedicated ample time to understanding our vision and delivered exactly what we needed, often adding his own thoughtful touches to enhance functionality and user experience. His attention to detail and commitment to quality truly exceeded our expectations. I’m certain we’ll work with him again and highly recommend his services to others!

Sahinur did an amazing job turning my ideas into a stunning website. His professionalism and expertise as a website developer were evident throughout the project. I’m excited to collaborate with him again!

The website was developed efficiently, with all adjustments made quickly according to my feedback. The end result is exactly what I envisioned, and I would certainly consider working together again for future website development projects.

Sahinur was an absolute pleasure to work with. Despite the time differences, he was always online to answer my queries immediately. He was very professional, attentive to my needs and was able to implement changes within 24hrs. I will be using him again for many future projects.

Thank you to himself and his fantastic development team!
